channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Shiqi Ye (å¶ä»•å¥‡)

item.description: Hi, my name is Shiqi Ye. I’m a third-year Joint Ph.D. student between the Chow Institute, Xiamen University and the Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science, Chinese Academy of Sciences. I am grateful to be advised by Prof. Tingguo Zheng, Prof. Yongmiao Hong, and Prof. Ming Lin. My research areas include econometrics, financial econometrics, climate economics, regional economics, energy economics, and the Chinese economy. My current research is mainly focused on:

Education Ph.D. Econometrices, Chow Institue, 2024 (expected). M.A. Applied Economics and Econometrices, University of Southern California, 2020. B.A. Mathematics and Applied Mathematics, University of Science and Technology of China, 2018. Experiences Academy of Mathematics and Systems Science at Chinese Academy of Sciences Joint Ph.D. student, 2022.09-2023.09. Fundamental Scientific Center for Economic Modeling and Economic Policy Studies research assistent, 2022.03-now. Paul and Gregory Chow Instutue for Studies in Economics, Xiamen University

Published Papers â€œAttention-aware Multi-hop Trust Inference in Online Social Networksâ€ (The Best Student Paper Award) (with Rongwei Xu, Guanfeng Liu, Xianmei Hua, Xuyun Zhang, and Junwen Lu). —International Conference on Data Science and Advanced Analytics, (2022) | Paper | Slides | Working Papers â€œFast Estimation of a Large TVP-VAR Model with Score-Driven Volatilitiesâ€ (with Tingguo Zheng and Yongmiao Hong). | PaperğŸ”’ | Slides | â€œCholesky GAS Models for Large Time-Varying Covariance Matricesâ€

Symposium on High Dimensional Complex Systems (Holders: Shiqi Ye and Hongyin Zhang) October 12, 2022, first meeting: “Bayesian Dynamic Tensor Regression” (Speaker: Shiqi Ye) | Paper | Slides | VideoğŸ”’ | October 26, 2022, second meeting: “A Comparison of the Influence of Sino-US Economic Factors on Bilateral Exchange Rates” (Speaker: Linyan Chen) | PaperğŸ”’ | “Estimation and Inference of Impulse Response by Local Projection” (Speaker: Hongyin Zhang) | Papers | Slides | VideoğŸ”’ | November 9, 2022, third meeting: “A Primer on Vector Autoregressions” (Speaker: Shiqi Ye) | Slides | “Global Trade Networks and the Influence of Stock Market Returns” (Speaker: Zhengwei Zou) | Paper | VideoğŸ”’ | November 23, 2022, fourth meeting: “Community Detection in Partial Correlation Network Models” (Speaker: Xiaolong Fan) | Paper | Slides | VideoğŸ”’ | December 15, 2022, fifth meeting: “Global Energy Market Connectedness and Dynamic Inflation at Risk” (Speaker: Lu Gong) | Slides | “The Term Structural of Growth-at-Risk” (Speaker: Shiqi Ye) | Paper | Slides | VideoğŸ”’ | January 4, 2023, sixth meeting: “Basic Format Adjustments for Chinese Paper Writing” (Speaker: Tingguo Zheng) | VideoğŸ”’ | “COVID-19 and Housing Market Fluctuations” (Speaker: Mo Zhou) | Slides | VideoğŸ”’ | “QAP Method for Network Analysis” (Speaker: Zhengwei Zou) | Paper | Slides | January 18, 2023, seventh meeting: “Dynamics and Structural Features of China’s Monetary Policy Based on Interpretable Machine Learning” (Speaker: Xinyue Fan) | Slides ğŸ”’ | “Local house-price vulnerability: Evidence from the U.
